snippet: A Federal Bureau of Investigation agent arrested in Pakistan for trying to board a civilian flight with 15 9-millimeter bullets and a knife in his luggage was released on $10,000 bail on Thursday, Pakistani authorities said.
abstract: Joel Cox, Federal Bureau of Investigation agent who was arrested in Pakistan for trying to board a civilian flight with 15 9-millimeter bullets and a knife in his luggage, is released on $10,000 bail.
lead_paragraph: A Federal Bureau of Investigation agent arrested in Pakistan for trying to board a civilian flight with 15 9-millimeter bullets and a knife in his luggage was released on $10,000 bail on Thursday, Pakistani authorities said.

headline.main: Pakistan: F.B.I. Agent Released on Bail
headline.print_headline: Pakistan: F.B.I. Agent Released on Bail
